org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class CartesianScaleLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.CartesianScaleLabel

  • public class CartesianScaleLabel
extends Object
    When creating a chart, you want to tell the viewer what data they are viewing. To do this, you need to label the getAxis().
    The scale label configuration defines options for the scale label. Note that this only applies to cartesian axes.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
